welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bacup, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes, historic landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal with a focus on long-haul flights and premium services.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warton Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
